creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: thirteen streamers attached to coarse cream waistband with one black tie; geometric and floral embroidery on coarse ground in red, orange, purple, green, light blue, pink, light green and black on streamers; all are bound in blue; bottom of each streamer has applied embroidered square in cross stitch; exposed paper backing on streamers
title: Streamer Skirt
